summary: Reading, Speech & Language Arts Teacher with over a decade of experience designing and implementing curricula aligned to Common Core Standards; strong communication, leadership, and public speaking skills; adept at collaborating with staff, fostering supportive relationships with students, and integrating technology to create organized, engaging learning environments.

experience.title: Reading, Speech & Language Arts Teacher
experience.description: Designed and implemented original reading curriculum around Common Core Standards; Taught 6th Grade English Language Arts including co-teaching; Focused on reading comprehension, spelling and vocabulary; Taught Speech Communication with emphasis on concepts, delivery skills and formats; Integrated individual and group projects and assessment; Taught sophomore English (American Literature), freshman English, and electives such as Creative Writing; Coordinated yearbook program, budgeting, sales and technology training; Supervised and assisted with graduation video production; On educational leave of absence following this period.

education.degree: Master of Arts in Secondary Classroom Teaching
Bachelor of Applied Arts in Interpersonal and Public Communication, Marketing

certifications: Secondary Teaching Certification: Communication & Theater English and Psychology (2000) - Saginaw Valley State University
Professional Education Certificate: Speech, Dramatic Arts/Theater (BD)
Recipient of the U.S. Department of Education TEACH Grant Program
